titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious letter to the Lord Maior and court of aldermen of the city of London about imploying the poor and vagrants.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
City of London (England). Lord Mayor.

notesStmt.note: Dates in the item contradict: the proclamation is dated "23 day of July in the Twelfth year of Our Reign" [i.e. 1660]; report from the Councell of the Royal Fishings, gives date "13. May 1663" as the date of accounts rendered.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
